item.description:
This place is really cool and groovy.

The owners are so nice and friendly too.

Plenty of fresh brewed draft beer and the best wings and pub food in NH...what else is there to ask for!

I would recommend to go to DollarMouse.com and get the 1/2 off food coupon (it's $10 for $20 worth of eats) so a coupon for two people would be a great savings...and who does not like to save!

Directions are easy. See Map.

* Meet
* Greet
* Eat
* Have Fun!
* We can also plan on playing parlor games there in 2011!! (Yee Ha!)
item.name: Sunday Night - Get-to-Gether - Talk and Socialize!
